attributes.additional_details:
I’m a grandmother of three grandchildren two different families I had been involved in their lives since they were babies and had a good relationship with their mothers.
My son’s rights to see their children have been diminished by their ex-partners the  manipulation & lies these women continue to uphold without being accountable & challenged is non- existent 
After this has been drawn to my attention I have been following a forum  this seems to be a country wide problem which needs serious action
attributes.background: Reform and training to be undertaken by Government officials & advocates to improve the rights for fathers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about equal rights for fathers, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
